abstract: Excerpts from New York Times coverage of Serena Williams's career from 1998 through 2003.
lead_paragraph: Excerpts from articles on three of Williams’s most memorable moments, beginning with her Grand Slam tournament debut in 1998.

headline.main: Covering Serena Williams Through the Years
